content.title: Dear Customer
content.text:
We respect and protect your privacy. We aim to achieve a high level of data security, and our data protection policy gives you an overview of what personal data we collect, process and share when you use our free registration and login service. You will also learn about the rights you have regarding data protection and how you can exercise these.

It is important that you read and understand our data protection policy.

download.title: Data protection
download.text: You can open and read our privacy policy as a PDF in your browser, or save it on your device.

button.title: Data protection policy in PDF format
button.label: Show Privacy policy
